qnStem.data:
Instructions:

1. Install app

Android - Search for 'YouVote' on google play store
iOS - Search for 'YouVote Apollos' on appstore

2. Open app and fill in your name

3. Enter the lesson id shown on the top left corner and click enter
tap on video when the pendulum is stationary.
tap on video when the pendulum is fastest.
tap on video when woman is feeling weightless.
tap on video when man is accelerating at g.
